attributes.action: Intervene to stop Gary McKinnon from being extradited.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Through the constant threat of extradition over several years, Gary McKinnon has served ample punishment for his crime of being a UFO fanatic who believes in conspiracy theories. He, as any UK citizen, deserves to have his human rights  protected by his government; the right to be tried in his own country.

rejection.details: We can not accept petitions about individual legal cases. The Home Secretary does not have general discretion in this case. He can only stop extradition if he finds that McKinnon’s human rights would be breached.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
